about_the_game:
This DLC contains

Dancer Jiujiu

2.88 million subscribers: Jiujiu is a college student under 20 years old. Although she is a dance zone UP, her level is very worrying. She usually travels to ancient towns with few tourists to participate in the "Ancient Style Small Gathering" activity, and her main task is to walk around in ancient costumes. With his pure and charming appearance and contrasting figure, he won a large number of fans with his "Laicai Dance" without any technical content.
